issues.title: Runs Ledger DB (runs, run_steps, run_artifacts)

issues.description: Verification that playbook deployments produce consistent, deterministic results

issues.title: Deploy Status Monitor (GREEN/YELLOW/RED)
issues.description: Real-time monitoring and status reporting for deployment health

issues.title: Post-Deploy Verification Playbook
issues.description: Automated verification playbook to validate deployments after completion
